entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: PinnedBlockMemoryPool metrics #61594
  • Ensure templates are built via a pipeline to support CG #61592
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #61591
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-noop, json, kestrel-header-symbols #61590
  • Min API validation extracts bad display name from DisplayAttribute #61589
  • [Infrastructure] We should add APICompat checks against previous shipped version of the assemblies to detect breaking changes #61588
  • CustomElements do not serve Blazor WASM files when a custom debugging environment is used. #61587
  • Make Interactive Mode Default mode for Blazor #61586
  • Silent crash occurs when using an <InputFile> for the Vivaldi browser. #61585
  • BLAZOR - @bind-Value:after stopped working after update #61584
  • EditForm in Blazor while post the data #61583
  • Error in connection establishment: net::ERR_CERT_AUTHORITY_INVALID (anonymous) @ aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js:268 getWebSocket @ aspnetcore-browser-r #61580
  • MapStaticAssets should support more powerful routing #61578
  • [Blazor] Document new Blazor metrics #61577
  • Disabling Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.Microbenchmarks #61574
  • Perf improvement: kestrel-header-symbols #61573
  • Perf improvement: kestrel-encoded-url, multiple_queries, multiple_queries #61572

Closed

  • JsonPatchDocument should use System.Text.Json #24333
    10.0-preview4
  • CSS styles not applied correctly after update to VS 17.12 #61520
  • In Blazor .Net 9 the component input type=date" resets the value while tipying when it calls the handler #61582
  • navigationManager.NavigateTo Runtime Error in .Net9. (works in .NET8) Utilizing MudBlazor Template with Authentication #61581
  • Blazor wasm navigation manager navigate to google oauth2 creates javascript error illegal invocation #61579
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #61553
  • Perf improvement: updates #61560
  • Perf regression: fortunes, multiple_queries #61561
  • Perf improvement: kestrel-hostheader-mismatch #61565

PullRequests

Created

  • update template descriptions to be more beginner-friendly #61593
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25216.37 #61576
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Added System.Text.Json serialization-based JsonPatch implementation #61313
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview4
  • Disable routing microbenchmarks #61575
    area-networking, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Update to Microsoft.OpenApi v2.0.0-preview.17 #61541
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Fix HttpLoggingMiddleware Request/Response bodies logging in case of stream being closed by a subsequent middleware #61490
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Add host.docker.internal and host.containers.internal to the dev cert SAN #61265
    area-commandlinetools
  • Add IMemoryPoolFactory and cleanup memory pool while idle #61554
    feature-iis, feature-kestrel, feature-httpsys, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Use inline boot config in tests #61557
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, 10.0-preview4
  • Updated CustomPolicyProvider to DotNet10 Style Project #61474
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • Add more gRPC interop test logging #61532
    area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Title: EF Core 9 Migrations Extremely Slow and Causing System Freezes #35976
  • Why does EF Core treat the conversion method of HashSet<int> differently? #35975
  • EFCore 9 Data Seeding is not invoking seeder within in-memory db #35974

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure templates are built via a pipeline to support CG #29108
  • TJ Test Issue #3 [Ignore] #29104
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder Package Causes Application Crash When Installed in .NET 9 in MAUI App #29100
  • DatePicker Format Not Respected on macOS #29099
  • [iOS 9.0.50] MauiIcon's Include parameter must be named appicon #29098

Closed

  • I8_Headers_and_Footers-VSPR Build (9.0.51) displays the footer "2019" in the middle of the header #29051
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [Enhancement] Hot Reload: make Styles with Class hot reload friendly #620
    .NET 10 Planning
  • .Net 9 MAUI MacCatalyst Desktop Shell App TabBar shows "MORE" when > 5 items #28184
  • TJ Test Issue #28739
    Backlog
  • [testing] Re enable some tests for visual comparison #28358
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [ANDROID] - Passing header to Webview #28590
  • Exceptions thrown when removing or inserting groups in a Grouped CollectionView #28113
  • Missing Info.plist value. A value for the Info.plist key 'CFBundleIconName' is missing in the bundle #28954

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Core API XML Documentation #29107
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 9 SR7
  • Changes in provisioning to fix fails installing Appium on Linux #29105
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [inflight] Change inflight package name #29103
  • [.Net10][Proposal] Circle & Polygon clicked event #29101
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-map

Merged

  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 29037 - [2025/04/21] Candidate #29049
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • [net10.0] Update sdk version for arcade #29102
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [net10.0, Testing] Enabled failed UITests for Switch control due to new OffColor API. #28495
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • [iOS] CollectionView2 - empty view - improvements #28119
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/04/21] Candidate - In Flight Branch #29037
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] SwipeView Closes when Content Changes - fix #29088
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [iOS] Button RTL text and image overlap - fix #29041
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Auto Resize chrome icons on iOS to make it more consistent with other platforms - TabBar #29093
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Add Accessibility Selected for Android and iOS CollectionView #29014
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2
  • [iOS] Auto Resize chrome icons on iOS to make it more consistent with other platforms - hamburger icon #29095
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, area-controls-flyoutpage, area-controls-flyout
  • [inflight][Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28953
    community ✨
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR7
  • [tests] Enable back some MemoryLeak tests #28484
    platform/android 🤖, area-testing, memory-leak 💦, testing-reenable, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Nullable DatePicker (make Date, MinimumDate & MaximumDate nullable) #27921
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android & iOS]Fix: GestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • Implement layout system performance metrics #29074
    area-layout, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView EmptyView Feature #28679
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fixed Footer not displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView in CV2 #28681
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [iOS] - Fixed SearchBar Dimension Handling to Respect WidthRequest and HeightRequest Values #27449
    area-testing, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows]Fix Dot based Date Format property in DatePicker not working on Windows #29058
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Remove InternalsVisibleTo for Toolkit #28994
    area-architecture, .NET 10 Planning
  • Obsolete UseMauiCompatibility for .NET 10 #29021
    t/breaking 💥, area-compatibility, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Windows] Fix for Argument Exception raised when the GetStringSize method of ICanvas called with default font #29048
    platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for IndicatorView using templated icons not working #28905
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Fix for Grouping collection view without data template results in displaying the default string representation of the object #28617
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed NavigationStack not updating when OnAppearing is invoked #28666
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Grouping Feature #29002
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - On iOS GestureRecognizers don't work on Span in a Label, which doesn't get IsVisible (=true) update from its parent #29024
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Prevent Picker from Gaining Focus #29068
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Backport CarouselView layout SR6 regressions #29062
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed the crash on iOS when setting HeightRequest on WebView inside a ScrollView with IsVisible set to false #29022
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Label text cropping when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout with specified with request #28661
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [MacOS] Fixed NullReferenceException when using ImagePaint #28726
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IL baselines in the compiler should use metadata display #78240
  • Move CreateCompilation to target NetLatest by default #78239
  • Area Roslyn Compiler Tests #78238
  • Code style rule severity (silent) correctly overrides rule default in build but not in VS Intellisense #78232
    Backlog

Closed

  • Improper IDE0028 Collection initialization can be simplified suggestion for `SortedList<TKey, TValue>` that changes semantics #78224
  • When I paste an indented snippet into a raw string literal, it is pasted twice #77020
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10521.04 #78229

PullRequests

Created

  • Address some PROTOTYPE comments #78241
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Use collection expressions #78237
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Catch and report when we are unable to make an invisible editor #78236
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allocate slightly less in ImmutableArrayExtensions.ConditionallyDeOrder #78235
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix crash when converting primary constructor to normal constructor #78234
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support empty root namespaces in ResxSourceGenerator #78233
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix async hoisted type substituted local #78231
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix missing extension-type symbol handling in VarianceSafety.cs #78230
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Reapply "Remove EditorFeatures from OOP (#78069)" (#78179) #78194
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [release/dev17.14] Enable Implement with Copilot by default #78149
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Emit CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute for instance operators #78163
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Merge main into features/dictionary-expressions #78228
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • Track stale projects #78242
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move test helpers to NetLatest #78082
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement ref safety analysis for instance compound assignment operators #78199
    Area-Compilers, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Fix razor analyzer loading #78116
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Initial stubs for doing analysis of copilot changes to help us drive post-change cleanup work. #78146
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • EnC: Track stale projects #78166
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Cache MEF catalog in servicehub process #78122
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update ApplyUpdates API to account for no-effect changes #78220
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, breaking-change
  • Dictionary expressions: create instance of immutable type for IReadOnlyDictionary<K, V> #78168
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Dictionary Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed '!"BBJ_EHFINALLYRET predecessor of block that doesn't follow a BBJ_CALLFINALLY!"' #114869
    10.0.0
  • JsonNode.DeepEquals method in System.Text.Json returns incorrect value when second object contains item not in first and length is same #114866

Closed

  • Support implicit value factory / Func<> generic factories in container #36387
  • Fast repeated resolution of dependency injection services #36385
  • Add a way to clean dependencyinjection caches #36409
  • ServiceCollectionDescriptorExtensions.Add extension method not bound #36128
  • DependencyInjection: Customizable constructor selection #36125
  • Passing additional arguments to service resolution #36058
  • Registering Nested Open Generic Types #36055
  • Backporting deadlock fixes in Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents to LTS #113332
  • dotnet run error Assert failure(PID 28188 [0x00006e1c], Thread: 26664 [0x6828]) in .net 9 #110000
  • Memory leak with `System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Meter` when not disposed #114601
  • Test failure: profiler/unittest/classload/classload.cmd #114760
    10.0.0
  • c# .Net 8, ambiguous between the following methods or properties: 'int.TryParse(string, out int)' and 'int.TryParse(System.ReadOnlySpan #114808
  • Support precompiling 'ComInterfaceEntry' vtables in ILC cctor interpreter (Native AOT) #114355
  • Office COM addin targeting .NET 10 Preview 1 cannot be registered 0x80008096 #113427
  • Support alternate delimiter in EventSourceLogger FilterSpecs #36399

PullRequests

Created

  • Update JITEEVersionIdentifier #114883
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update LoopHeadPred to point to right loop IG #114882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Support Rate Limiting Trace Sampling #114880
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Do not set the salt or info if they are NULL for OpenSSL HKDF. #114877
    area-System.Security, 9.0.x
  • Tar: Write unused GNU tar entry size, ctime and atime bytes in the expected format #114868
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Unmasking EGPRs in register allocator #114867
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bugfix/113926 fix invalid jsonnode deserialization #114863
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [infra][Apple] Fix Apple mobile runtime test reporting #114862
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • JIT: Add runtime async transformation #114861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, runtime-async
  • [clr-interp] Implement `CEE_LOCALLOC` and frame data allocator for dynamic stack allocations #114860
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Check existing neutral flag on R2R rewrite #114850
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Abolish PSPSym from ABI #114630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update Fedora helix images -- 41 -> 42 #114791
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do not set the salt or info if they are NULL for OpenSSL HKDF. #114864
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Improve error message when running on outdated Windows OS with incomplete CET support #114839
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix build with enabled FEATURE_ENABLE_NO_ADDRESS_SPACE_RANDOMIZATION #112689
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Profiler][Tests] Add shutdown guard and filter to classload test #114849
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix hard fingerprint on json boot config with OverrideHtmlAssetPlaceholders=true #114859
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Make it possible to preinitialize `ComInterfaceEntry` #114459
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove gitter from readme #114841
    area-Meta
  • JIT: don't mark callees noinline for non-fatal observations with pgo #114821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Merge from labs, all except JIT #114675
    area-VM-coreclr, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • Adding additional 8 eGPR. #113988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Build host.native for native AOT libraries testing #114764
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add runtimeconfig switch for Thread_UseAllCpuGroups/Thread_AssignCpuGroups #114799
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix the amd64 cross-DAC stack unwinding #114836
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add long/ulong->float cast helpers #114597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TEST] No-op comment change #114048
    NO-REVIEW, test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • Add CPUID for AvxVnniInt8 and AvxVnniInt16 #113956
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Allow limited recursive inlining #112318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some bugs to make NativeAOT stable. #114618
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Improve the functionality of LoongArch64 R2R #114666
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Micro optimizations to improve the performance of EH stackwalking, particularly in the X86 with Funclets model #114582
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Make specifying just `DllImportSearchPath.AssemblyDirectory` only search in assembly directory #114756
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 2: Generate empty GC info and add baseline implementation of EnumGcRefs #113948
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • JIT: Speed up floating to integer casts on x86/x64 #114410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Create transport package and rename the cdac reader #114812
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fold "new T[size].Length" into "size" #114845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize bit-wise and operation and compare with same constant value #111933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added missing clearing of pooled arrays #114545
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [infra][apple-mobile] Migrate MacCatalyst and iOS/tvOS simulator jobs to `osx.14.arm64.open` and `osx.15.amd64.open` queues #114633
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #114668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #114700
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reliable clean-up of SafeHandles in Deflater/Inflater #114826
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Remove List<T> allocation in Task.WhenAll for empty sequences #114002
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Handle non-mapped images correctly #114688
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Create a single copy of stub templates #114462
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] Use OverrideHtmlAssetPlaceholders=true in browser template #113654
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Try out a PackedSimd WideningLoader #114811
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging][wasm][interpreter] Fix PackedSimd interpreter intrinsics #114218
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm][aot] try disabling dwarf symbols in the aot output #114805
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Improve wrapper method inliner heuristic #113266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement region write barriers #111636
    arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix inconsistent newline format when logging exceptions to console. #114692
    area-VM-coreclr

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet sln add Doesn't Work on Cross-Drive Path #48608
  • Ensure templates are built via a pipeline to support CG #48607
  • Set up BannedApiAnalyzers #48605
  • [PackageValidation] Add support to do baseline package validation when the new one has dropped supported TFMs #48602
  • [10.0 Preview 4 VMR build] There is an error NU1102: Unable to find package Microsoft... when creating 10.0 Mvc IndAuth project after installing .NET 10.0 SDK #48598

Closed

  • Workload errors with nightly SDK #42563
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • sln-add: Don't add solution folders with invalid chars #48611
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • update template descriptions to be more beginner-friendly #48609
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Lift VMR's eng/versions.props to PSB in source only builds #48604
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Validate xunit removal #48603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Set PlatformTarget to AnyCPU for modern .NET #48599
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable telemetry notice tests by removing attribute #48595
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Adding new training and labeler per the instructions #48495
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Optimize compression #47734
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [WIP] `dotnet tool exec <package[@version]>` one-shot execution #48443
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • package-add: Use PackageIdentityArgument #48402
    untriaged
  • Encode container image manifests in ImageBuilder via Encoder Fixes #47399 #48255
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • [StaticWebAssets] Cleanup ApplyCompressionNegotiation.cs and ResolveCompressedAssets.cs #48082
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update multi-file 'dotnet run file' documentation #48437
    documentation, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Add --os, --arch and --cross in VMR build script #48591
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48577
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
